title: Exercises: Action Verbs and Simple Instructions

items.prompt: Which action do you use to answer an email?
items.explanation: 'Reply' is used to send an answer back to the person who sent you the email.

items.prompt: What does 'Forward' mean in an email context?
options: To send a received email to another person.
To save the email in a folder.
To change the subject of the email.
items.explanation: Forwarding is sending a message you received to a third party.

items.prompt: Please ________ the document. I need a paper copy.
items.explanation: To get a paper copy, you need to 'print' the document.

items.prompt: What is the correct negative instruction?
items.explanation: We use 'Don't' + base verb for negative imperatives in English.

items.prompt: ________ the report to the manager immediately. (Envía)
items.explanation: The imperative form for 'Enviar' is 'Send'.

items.prompt: What does 'Attach' mean?
options: To add a file to an email
items.explanation: Attaching a file means adding a document or image to your message.

items.prompt: Which verb means 'Revisar' or 'Comprobar'?
items.explanation: 'Check' is the common administrative verb for 'revisar'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (no) reply to all recipients.
items.explanation: Use 'don't' to form negative instructions.

items.prompt: What do you do if you want to keep an email for later?
items.explanation: 'Archive' is the action used to save an email in a folder for future reference.

items.prompt: ________ the invoice for the records. (Guarda)
items.explanation: The imperative form for 'Guardar' is 'Save'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: What action should the person take?
items.transcript: Hi Mark, please forward the contract to the legal department today.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'please forward the contract'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: What should the person NOT do?
items.transcript: Whatever you do, don't delete that spreadsheet. It has all the budget info.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'don't delete that spreadsheet'.

items.prompt: Listen and identify the verb: 'Please ________ the file to the email.'
items.transcript: Don't forget to attach the file to the email before sending it.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'attach the file'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: Who should the person reply to?
items.transcript: Please reply to the client as soon as possible.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'reply to the client'.

items.prompt: Listen and identify the object: '________ the documents.'
items.transcript: Print the documents and put them on my desk, please.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'Print the documents'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: What is the instruction?
items.transcript: Check the spelling in the report before you print it.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'Check the spelling'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: Where should the file be saved?
items.transcript: Save the file in the shared folder so everyone can see it.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'Save the file in the shared folder'.

items.prompt: Listen and complete: 'Please ________ the printer.'
items.transcript: The printer is still on. Please turn off the printer.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'turn off the printer'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: What should be done with the email?
items.transcript: This email is important. Archive it in the project folder.
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'Archive it'.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: Why is the person writing?
items.transcript: I am writing to remind you to send the monthly report by 5 PM.
options: To remind to send a report
items.explanation: The speaker says: 'remind you to send the monthly report'.

items.prompt: ________ (No abras) the attachment. It looks suspicious.
items.explanation: The negative imperative for 'No abras' is 'Don't open'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (revisa) the figures in the table.
items.explanation: 'Check' is the verb for 'revisar'.

items.prompt: ________ (Cierra) all programs before restarting the computer.
items.explanation: The imperative form for 'Cerrar' is 'Close'.

items.prompt: Don't ________ (olvides) to include the CC.
items.explanation: 'Forget' is the verb for 'olvidar'.

items.prompt: ________ (Adjunta) the PDF to your reply.
items.explanation: 'Attach' is the verb for 'adjuntar'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (reenvía) this to the CEO.
items.explanation: 'Forward' is the verb for 'reenviar'.

items.prompt: ________ (No borres) the history. We need it.
items.explanation: The negative imperative for 'No borres' is 'Don't delete'.

items.prompt: ________ (Guarda) your work every fifteen minutes.
items.explanation: 'Save' is the verb for 'guardar'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (responde) to the email by noon.
items.explanation: 'Reply' is the verb for 'responder/contestar'.

items.prompt: ________ (Imprime) two copies of the agenda.
items.explanation: 'Print' is the verb for 'imprimir'.

Match the verbs with the objects:
Match the imperatives:
Match the abbreviations:
Match the Spanish to English instructions:
Match the opposites:
Match the verb with its purpose:
Match the buttons in an email app:
Match the office equipment with the verb:
Match the phrasal verbs:
Someone sends you a great resource. You want to share it with your boss. What do you do?
items.explanation: Forwarding is used to share received information with others.

items.prompt: Your inbox is full of old emails you don't need anymore. What should you do?
items.explanation: 'Delete' is the action to remove unnecessary emails.

items.prompt: You receive a question from a client. What is the first thing you should do?
items.explanation: You should 'Reply' to answer questions from clients.

items.prompt: You need to send a copy of an email to a colleague for their information only. You use:
items.explanation: CC (Carbon Copy) is used to send copies to others.

items.prompt: Which instruction is most appropriate for a manager to a subordinate?
items.explanation: 'Please' + base verb is the standard professional way to give instructions.

items.prompt: If you want to 'Save' a digital file to your computer, you are:
items.explanation: Saving is the act of storing digital data for future use.

items.prompt: What do you do when you 'Log out' of your email?
items.explanation: Logging out means ending your current session on a program or website.

items.prompt: Translate: 'No imprimas ese documento todavía'.
items.explanation: Negative imperative: 'Don't' + base verb.

items.prompt: What does 'Inbox' mean?
items.explanation: 'Inbox' is where you receive new messages.

items.prompt: Which of these is a phrasal verb?
items.explanation: 'Turn off' consists of a verb + particle, making it a phrasal verb.

items.prompt: Please ________ (adjunta) the scanned receipt.
items.explanation: To add a file to an email is to 'attach' it.

items.prompt: Don't ________ (olvides) to save your changes.
items.explanation: 'Forget' is the verb for 'olvidar'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (envía) the invitation to the whole team.
items.explanation: 'Send' is the verb for 'enviar'.

items.prompt: ________ (No compartas) your password with anyone.
items.explanation: Negative imperative: 'Don't share'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (revisa) your email every morning.
items.explanation: Checking your email is a daily administrative task.

items.prompt: ________ (Imprime) the labels for the folders.
items.explanation: 'Print' is the imperative for 'Imprimir'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (responde) as soon as possible.
items.explanation: 'Reply' or 'respond' are both correct, but 'reply' is very common in emails.

items.prompt: ________ (No borres) the backup files.
items.explanation: Negative instruction for 'No borres'.

items.prompt: Please ________ (reenvía) the confirmation email to me.
items.explanation: 'Forward' means to send a received message to someone else.

items.prompt: ________ (Guarda) the document as a PDF.
items.explanation: 'Save' is the verb for 'guardar'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Hi Jane, please forward the invoice from OfficeSupplies to Mr. Smith. Then, archive the original email. Thanks, Bob.' What should Jane do first?
items.explanation: The email says 'first forward... then archive'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Team, please don't reply to all on this message. Just send your individual reports to me. - Sarah.' Who should the team send reports to?
items.explanation: Sarah says 'send your individual reports to me'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Please check the printer in Room 204. It is making a strange noise. Don't use it until I arrive. - Tech Support.' What is the instruction?
items.explanation: The message explicitly says 'Don't use it'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Subject: Meeting Notes. Hi all, I attached the notes from today. Please save them to the project folder. Best, Carlos.' What is Carlos's instruction?
options: Save the notes to the folder
items.explanation: Carlos says 'Please save them to the project folder'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Important: Don't forget to CC the manager on all client replies. This is a new rule.' What is the new rule?
items.explanation: The rule is to 'CC the manager on all client replies'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Please print 50 copies of this brochure for the event tomorrow.' How many copies are needed?
items.explanation: The text asks for '50 copies'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Forward this email to HR after you read it. They need the employee list.' Who needs the list?
items.explanation: The email says 'Forward this... to HR. They need the list'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Check your spam folder. Sometimes my emails go there by mistake.' Where should you look?
items.explanation: The instruction is to 'Check your spam folder'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Don't delete the old invoices. We need them for the audit next month.' Why shouldn't you delete them?
items.explanation: The text says they are needed 'for the audit'.

items.prompt: READING: 'Please attach your photo to the application form.' What should you add to the form?
items.explanation: The instruction is to 'attach your photo'.

items.prompt: Which of these is a direct instruction?
options: I want to send an email.
items.explanation: 'Send the email' is a direct imperative.

items.prompt: Please ________ (no abras) the link.
items.explanation: Negative imperative for 'No abras'.

items.prompt: What does 'Archive' mean?
items.explanation: 'Archive' is the action of storing for later.

items.prompt: ________ (Revisa) the attachment for errors.
items.explanation: Imperative form for 'Revisar'.

items.prompt: How do you make an instruction more polite in English?
items.explanation: Adding 'Please' is the standard way to soften instructions.
